data.name: Welcome To... Chichester 3 : Encyclopedia
data.detailed_description:
A detailed encyclopedia of all the characters (both main and side), organisations and other items from the Welcome To... Chichester trilogy.

As this contains spoilers, you will be warned whether you want to access the information, if you haven't completed the game
data.about_the_game:
A detailed encyclopedia of all the characters (both main and side), organisations and other items from the Welcome To... Chichester trilogy.

As this contains spoilers, you will be warned whether you want to access the information, if you haven't completed the game

fullgame.name: Welcome To... Chichester 3 : The Demon Of Chichester And The Last Day

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 upwards
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or later
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or later
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
